A LEVEL ABOVE
50 Ocean’s panoramic, second level floor to ceiling windows overlooking the beautiful Atlantic Ocean as it washes ashore the white sands of Delray Beach, is the backdrop to an unmatched dining experience. Reminiscent of the Florida of old, mixed with the class of its Palm Beach roots, 50 Ocean brings it all together with an inviting, original, and relaxed atmosphere designed to appreciate its one of a kind location. The unique décor and understated elegance allow guests the perfect setting for any occasion.
BRUNCH SIT-DOWN
(15-25 Guests)
(Inclusive of Orange Juice, Coffee, Iced Tea and Fountain Soda)
FOR THE TABLE
Sea Baker’s Basket | Seasonal Fruit Plate
STARTERS
(Choice of Two)
The Mediterranean (GF)
Baby Heirloom Tomatoes, Crumbled Goat Cheese, Sweet Red Onions, Basil Vinaigrette
The Berry (GF/VG)
Toasted Almond Granola, Vanilla Greek Yogurt, Seasonal Berries, Honey, Fresh Mint
50 Ocean Caesar
Crisp Romaine, Herb Focaccia Croutons, Shaved Grana Padano, Crunchy Parmesan Cheese, Creamy Caper Dressing
Lobster Bisque
Crostini, Lobster Chunks, Chili Oil
BRUNCH FAVORITES
(Choice of Four)
Shrimp & Cheese Grits
Aged Cheddar, Cajun Andouille Sausage, Louisiana Shrimp Sauce
Crispy Chicken N' Waffles
Hand-Breaded Breast, Jalapeño Corn Relish, Belgian Waffle, Jalapeño-Maple Syrup
A1A Benedict
Two Soft Poached Eggs, Canadian Bacon, Sundried Tomato, Chive Hollandaise, Toasted English Muffin
Smoked Salmon & Smashed Avocado
Soft Poached Egg, Honey-Grain Mustard Vinaigrette, Micro-Herb Salad, Thick-Cut Whole Wheat Toast
The "Cure" Burger
Our Signature Beef Blend, Applewood Smoked Bacon, Aged Cheddar, LTO, Zesty Pickle Aioli, Sunny Side Fried Egg, Butter-Griddled Brioche Bun
Croque Madame
Shaved Honey-Glazed Ham, Grilled Sunny Side Fried Egg, Melted Gruyere Cheese, Butter-Griddled Brioche
Floridian French Toast
Cinnamon & Vanilla Custard Battered Brioche, Sautéed Bananas, Papayas, Toasted Almonds, Cointreau Infused Maple Syrup
Sweet Potato and Kale Hash Skillet
Two Soft Poached Eggs, Onions, Red Pepper, Chickpeas, Kale, Smoked Sea Salt, Cracked Black Pepper
END .menu-wrapper
BRUNCH BUFFET
(25 Guest Minimum)
(Inclusive of Orange Juice, Coffee, Iced Tea and Fountain Soda)
SALAD STATION
(Choice of Two)
Caesar
Crisp Romaine, Herb Focaccia Croutons, Shaved Grana Padano, Crunchy Parmesan Cheese Creamy Caper Dressing
Caprese
Heirloom Tomato, Sliced Mozzarella, Basil Leaf, Evoo, Balsamic Glaze
Artisan Greens
Mixed Greens, Tomato, Onion, Candied Walnuts, Seasonal Berries, Passionfruit Vinaigrette
ENTRÉE STATIONS
(Choice of Three)  ·  Served with a choice of Applewood Smoked Bacon or Pork Sausage and Signature Breakfast Potatoes
Classic Eggs Benedict
English Muffin, Canadian Bacon, Soft Poached Egg, Chive Hollandaise
Chicken N' Waffles
Belgian Waffle, Hand-Breaded Chicken Breast, Jalapeño Corn Relish, Maple-Jalapeño Syrup
Scrambled Egg Skillet
Sun-Dried Tomatoes, Caramelized Onions, Baby Spinach, Cheddar Cheese
Churrasco Flank Steak
Chimichurri Sauce
Sweet Potato & Kale Hash Skillet (GF/V)
Caramelized Onions, Peppers, Chickpeas, Smoked Sea Salt and Cracked Black Pepper
Floridian French Toast
Cinnamon & Vanilla Custard Battered Brioche, Sautéed Bananas, Papayas, Toasted Almonds, Cointreau Infused Maple Syrup
DESSERT STATION
Assorted Mini Sweets
END .menu-wrapper
DINNER SIT-DOWN
(15-25 Guests)
(Inclusive of Dinner Rolls for the table)
STARTERS
(Please Select Two Salad Options for your guests to choose from)  ·  Choice of Lobster Bisque or Salad
Lobster Bisque
Crostini, Lobster Chunks, Chili Aioli
Caesar Salad
Crisp Romaine, Herb Focaccia Croutons, Shaved Grana Padano, Crunchy Parmesan Cheese, Creamy Caper Dressing
Caprese
Heirloom Tomato, Sliced Mozzarella, Basil Leaf, Evoo, Balsamic Glaze
Little Gem Wedge
Heirloom Tomatoes, Smoked Applewood Bacon, Maytag Blue Cheese, Buttermilk Herb Dressing
ENTRÉES
(Choice of Four)
NY Strip
Crushed Herb-Roasted Fingerlings, Crispy Brussels Sprouts, Caramelized Onions, Signature Truffle Butter
Mahi-Mahi
Grilled, Garden Quinoa, Wilted Spinach, Fennel Slaw, Roasted Heirloom Tomato Vinaigrette
Chicken
Oven-Roasted Chicken, Honey-Citrus Glaze, Sweet Potato Mash, Buttermilk Cornbread, Corn salsa
Salmon
Pan-Seared, Herb Roasted Fingerling, Wilted Spinach, Olives, Evoo, Tomato-Cucumber Relish, Crispy Capers
Scallops
Pan-Seared, Creamy Risotto, Herbed Asparagus, Sweet Peas, Wild Mushrooms, Aged Balsamic, Grana Padano
Lamb
Grilled Rack, Olive-Raisin Tapenade, Orange Segments, Madeira Wine Reduction, Aged Manchego, Mint-Infused Pan Juices
Crabcake
Jumbo Lump Blue Crab Meat, Arugula and Tomato Salad, Mango-Chili Aioli
DESSERT
Key Lime Pie | Chocolate Chip Cookie Ala Mode | Apple Crumble Ala Mode
END .menu-wrapper
DINNER BUFFET
(25 Guest Minimum)
(Inclusive of Dinner Rolls for the table)
PASSED HORS D'OEVRES
(Additional hors d'oevres can be ordered with a 25 piece minimum)

SIGNATURE DISPLAYS

Crudité

Hummus

Meyer Lemon Marinade, London Gin-Cocktail Sauce
Mini Sweet Treats
Assorted Cupcakes, Cheesecakes, and Confections
END .menu-wrapper
50 OCEAN BEVERAGE PACKAGE
HOUSE SPIRITS
Spirits
New Amsterdam Vodka, Bombay Gin, Bacardi Superior Rum, Sauza Silver Tequila, Jim Beam Bourbon, Dewar's Scotch, Canadian Club Whisky
Domestic

Heineken, Corona, Corona Light, Red Stripe
